name: Green Coin
description: Green Flow utilizes a blockchain  network to generate cryptocurrency fueled by eco-friendly kinetic energy of caloric expenditure. This revolutionary technology allows users to earn “Greencoin” while exercising. Green flow procures a mutual symbiosis between health and wealth. The electricity generated by Green Flow enabled devices and fitness data is harvested to power the Green Flow Blockchain which directly creates a source of crypto-income. To debut our Green Technology we have a data procuring watch that tracks measurable caloric expenditure in any location, 24 hours/day that doubles as a crypto wallet. Green Flow has revolutionized the stationary bike to become a massive cryptocurrency currency mining resource. Our Green Flow bike also utilizes the same blockchain technology to convert calories burned into usable kinetic energy to fuel your crypto-income. Green Flow intends on creating an exponential amount of eco-friendly, exercise driven resources that have our blockchain enabled technology readily available to users.
